translations.This stream will show events like additi: Gebeure soos toevoegings, veranderinge en delings word in hierdie stroom vertoon
translations.There are no events for this filter: Daar is geen gebeure vir hierdie filter
translations.You are receiving this email because the: U ontvang hierdie e-pos na aanleiding van die volgende gebeure by %s
translations.List your own file actions in the stream: Lys u eie lêeraksies in die stroom
translations.Notify about your own actions via email: Stel in kennis oor u eie aksies d.m.v. e-pos
translations.You need to set up your email address be: U moet u e-posadres opstel alvorens u kennisgewings per e-pos kan ontvang.
translations.No more events to load: Geen meer gebeure om te laai
